force.name: Starr Force: A New Hope
force.description:
It is a period of brawl war. Rebel spaceships, striking from a hidden base, have won their first victory against the evil Galactic Empire. During the battle, Rebel spies managed to steal secret plans to the Empire's ultimate weapon, the I.K.E., an armored siege turet with enough power to destroy an entire Starr Park.

Win Siege or Takedown with Ruffs, Colette or Bull. (Any trophies)

empire.name: Starr Force: The Empire Strikes Back
empire.description:
It is a dark time for the Rebellion. Although the I.K.E. has been destroyed, Imperial troops have driven the Rebel forces from their hidden base and pursued them across the Starr Park. 
Evading the dreaded Imperial Starfleet, a group of freedom fighters led by Colonel Ruffs has established a new secret base on the remote ice area of Snowtel.

Win Hotzone or Bounty with Spike, Mr. P or Lou. (Any trophies)
